document_data.name: ''Maernos Family Crest''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Maernos family crest''''' was the [[enchanted]] pendant that belonged to [[Charissa Maernos]] ''circa'' [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Description: This regal-looking [[amulet]] was adorned with the crest of the [[Maernos]] noble family of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Powers: ''Maernos family crest'' was imbued with charisma-boosting enchantments that made the wearer arrear more regal even if they were dressed in rags.
document_data.History: Sometime before 1374 DR, ''Maernos family crest'' belonged to Charissa Maernos' mother. Eventually, the enchanted amulet was passed along to Charissa, a young [[paladin]] who traveled to [[Westgate]] in search of revenge against the [[Night Masks]] who ruined her family.
